game.name: Prince of Qin
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, LAN PvP, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The game balances team-fighting, with up to five heroes per team, and the use of various skills and abilities. The player is challenged by many enemies in more than 100 unique scenes accurately depicting the society and architecture of the Qin dynasty.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The game balances team-fighting, with up to five heroes per team, and the use of various skills and abilities. The player is challenged by many enemies in more than 100 unique scenes accurately depicting the society and architecture of the Qin dynasty.
game.developers: Object Software, ZOOM Platform Media, Jordan Freeman Group

reviewHighlights.text: 킨온라인의 전신게임이죠 추억의 게임인데 한글판이 없는게 참 아쉽네요 인기 있는겜도 아니지만 싱글로 하면 발더스 + 디아블로 느낌이고 멀티로 하면 한가지 캐릭만 컨트롤 할수있는데 꼭 예전 킨온라인 느낌이 납니다. 재미있어요 2D게임 좋아 하시면 강추 합니다. 느린 게임...
